subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: CSKA Moscow won its sixth Euroleague championship, as Trajan Langdon, the most valuable player, scored 21 points in a 91-77 victory over Maccabi Tel Aviv in Madrid. CSKA beat Maccabi in the final for the second time in three years and is two titles behind Real Madrid, which has eight.
